title: Conceptual Framework Development Program for Improving e-Learning Quality (Mathematics Field)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online education operation experience and intermediate or higher expertise in mathematics curriculum
context.additional_context: A practical competency-building program for designing and improving math e-learning content in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Participants can explain the five core elements of an e-learning quality evaluation framework (accessibility, interactivity, content accuracy, etc.).
Participants can diagnose and improve the quality of existing e-learning materials using an assessment checklist tailored to mathematics subject characteristics.
Participants can apply a feedback protocol to enhance e-learning design capabilities through collaboration with peer instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
